nodes.text: Sarell Harmion was an executive who worked for Gastess' Finance, Inc. Like his employer Sarlim Gastess and his brothers Halleb and K'yne, he operated by taking control of well-run corporations, ruthlessly running them for short-term profit, and leaving the ruins behind once every last credit was gone. Though he was the only one of the Harmion brothers who was unmarried, it is reported that he had an obnoxious girlfriend who took a sadistic glee in his work.
